posts.post_content:
I am looking to add to my set of T222's.  Does anyone have any that they would be willing to part with?  I have a T222 Lapp PSA 3 that I could use to trade as well as some other trade fodder.

Thanks,

Barry

Hadn't really thought about selling this, but would listen to an offer if you need it. Sorry for the large scan--just wanted you to have the best look)

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/imoverhere/prewar/various/14t222schang.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
Wow Todd, that is a beautiful looking card!  The Schang card is actually one of the cards in the set that I already own.  Thanks for looking, though.
